entries.femaleVariant: This is a meditation of the Water element.
We are in the forest, before us is a waterfall.
Give me youth, wisdom, knowledge, health, strength, joy, happiness, and lasting inner peace.
We draw the spirit of water into ourselves. Together, we are one body.
Wash me of sickness, pain, the impurity of my body and soul, the negative energy of negative people, worlds and dimensions.
We thank you, Spirit of Water, with our mind, body and soul. There is no life without you.
Spirit of Water, I send you greetings! Eighty per cent of our flesh and blood is made of you.
One moment you are liquid, the next you are ice â€“ another you are snow, vapor and fog. One minute you heal, the next you drown.
O! What a mystery you are, Spirit of Water!
We are water. We are the ones who flow over the waterfall's edge.
We honor the beauty hidden within you and the other elements...
